DOC.brief_summary: High blood pressure pregnancy affect around 10 % pregnancy , associate serious adverse outcome mother baby . Treatment option management high blood pressure pregnancy currently limit . Studies non-pregnant individual show supplementation dietary nitrate , use beetroot juice , significantly low blood pressure improve blood flow . This study aim investigate whether supplementation dietary nitrate ( via beetroot juice ) improve blood pressure regulation pregnant woman chronic high blood pressure , also determine whether improve blood flow across placenta .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Dietary Nitrate Hypertensive Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: Women diagnose chronic hypertension ( systolic blood pressure 130144 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure 8094 mmHg ) . Between 22 35+6 week gestation Multifetal pregnancy Currently take antihypertensive medication Preexisting diabetes ( Type 1 Type 2 ) Lacking ability consent
